data.meta_description: Sun Capital Partners, Inc. | 22,273 followers on LinkedIn. Operationally Driven Private Equity Firm | Sun Capital Partners, Inc. is a global private equity firm that focuses on partnering with outstanding management teams to accelerate value creation. Since 1995, Sun Capital has invested in more than 540 companies worldwide with revenues in excess of $50 billion across a broad range of industries and transaction structures. The Firm has built a reputation as a trusted partner, recognized for its operational experience.

We are excited to announce that we have moved to a new office in New York City! Our new address is: 666 Third Ave, Suite 2402 New York, New York, 10017. We look forward to welcoming you to our new office soon and thank you for your continued support and partnership.

We are pleased to share our Mid-Year Highlights... In the first half of the year, we continued to execute our buy & build strategy by completing 20 add-on acquisitions to our existing portfolio. We also completed 2 exits and in May signed an agreement to sell a platform that is expected to close in the third quarter. Continue reading mid-year highlights: https://lnkd.in/enBNhrUF

We are excited to welcome two new associates to our transactions team! Fernando Sayeg will be based in our Boca office and Niko Restifo in our New York office. Welcome to the team Fernando and Niko. Matthew leads the LA office where he invests in and works with management teams in the services, food, and consumer sectors. In his role as an investment professional, Matthew believes good culture drives performance, and he has played a crucial role in fostering a positive work environment at Sun Capital! Matthew is a role model at Sun Capital for his ability to be an empathetic and effective leader. Thank you for your 23 years of excellence, Matthew Garff. Your leadership continues to inspire us all. Here's to celebrating this milestone. We are looking forward to many more achievements together.

Anderson Business Advisors, an affiliated portfolio company of Sun Capital, completed its fifth Coastroad Group and sixth Cayman Management Ltd. add-on acquisition. The Group of companies are operating under the Anderson Global brand. Anderson Global is a global buy and build platform in the corporate services sector offering a comprehensive set of incorporation, registered agent and ancillary (e.g. accounting, tax and bookkeeping) services covering the entire lifecycle of entities with +600 employees, 15 office locations across 6 countries and over 20 years of experience. We are pleased to share our activity for the first quarter of 2024. We successfully completed two exits and 14 add-on acquisitions to our existing portfolio. Moreover, we take great pride in announcing the promotions of two senior investment professionals. Jonathan Jackson and Alexander Wyndham were each promoted from Principal to Managing Director. In addition to these two promotions there were an additional 10 promotions across departments. We extend our sincere gratitude to our valued partners and employees whose efforts have made these accomplishments possible. Read more: https://lnkd.in/eGZPcvTG
